title: Europe is scaling back GDPR and relaxing AI laws
author: ksec
aiHeadline: Europe caves to Big Tech lobbyists, quietly loosening GDPR restrictions and opening the floodgates for AI surveillance with some sneaky backdoors.

title: Your smartphone, their rules: App stores enable corporate-government censorship
author: pabs3
aiHeadline: Your smartphone is now a tool of censorship, as app stores become the new gatekeepers enforcing the rules of corporate overlords and Big Brother alike.

title: The Death of Arduino?
author: ChuckMcM
aiHeadline: The Arduino revolution is over, and the reign of proprietary tech begins as the DIY community mourns the loss of their beloved open-source hero.

title: Building more with GPT-5.1-Codex-Max
author: hansonw
aiHeadline: GPT-5.1-Codex-Max is here, and it's not just building housesâ€”it's building entire empires, one line of code at a time.

title: Thunderbird adds native Microsoft Exchange email support
author: babolivier
aiHeadline: Thunderbird finally gives in to corporate demands, adding native Microsoft Exchange support so you can seamlessly integrate with the rest of your workplace's ecosystem of misery.
